app.name: Lume
meta.description.privacy: Lume Privacy Policy - Zero data collection, self-hosted period tracker.
auth.register_subtitle: First launch of Lume. After sign up, complete cycle setup.
validation.email: Please enter a valid email address.
auth.password_requirements: Minimum 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, and a number.
auth.remember_me_hint: Without this, sign-in is kept only until you close the browser.
auth.forgot_password_subtitle: Enter your recovery code to continue.
auth.reset_password_subtitle: Use a strong password for your account.
auth.recovery_code_subtitle: Store this code offline. It is shown only once.
auth.saved_recovery_code: I saved my recovery code in a safe place.
auth.confirm_logout: Log out of your account now?
auth.must_change_password: Password reset is required before continuing.
auth.mode_error: Could not detect setup mode. Please refresh.
auth.error.invalid_input: Please check your email and password.
auth.error.registration_disabled: Registration is disabled after initial setup.
auth.error.email_exists: An account with this email already exists.
auth.error.weak_password: Use at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, and a number.
auth.error.too_many_recovery_attempts: Too many recovery attempts. Try again in 15 minutes.
auth.error.too_many_login_attempts: Too many login attempts. Please wait 15 minutes.
auth.error.too_many_forgot_password_atte: Too many recovery attempts. Please wait 1 hour.
auth.error.invalid_reset_token: Reset link is invalid or expired.
auth.error.generic: Unable to continue. Please try again.
onboarding.welcome.title: Let's set up your tracker in a minute
onboarding.welcome.subtitle: A quick 3-step setup before your first dashboard.
onboarding.welcome.details: You cannot skip setup, but it only takes a few taps.
onboarding.step1.title: When did your last period start?
onboarding.step1.subtitle: Choose a date from the last 60 days.
onboarding.step2.title: Set up cycle parameters
onboarding.step2.cycle_warning: Cycle values above 45 days should be discussed with a doctor.
onboarding.step2.period_warning: Period duration above 8 days should be discussed with a doctor.
onboarding.step2.auto_period_fill_hint: When enabled, marking the first day auto-fills the next days based on your period length.
onboarding.step3.title: All set! üéâ
onboarding.step3.message: Now you can track symptoms, mood, and monitor your cycle
onboarding.error.invalid_last_period_sta: Please select a valid last period start date.
onboarding.error.last_period_range: Choose a date within the last 60 days.
onboarding.error.cycle_length_range: Cycle length must be between 15 and 90 days.
onboarding.error.period_length_range: Period length must be between 1 and 10 days.
onboarding.error.generic: Failed to save onboarding data. Please try again.
settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage cycle parameters, account security and data.
settings.cycle.title: Cycle Parameters
settings.cycle.cycle_warning: Cycle values above 45 days should be discussed with a doctor.
settings.cycle.period_warning: Period duration above 8 days should be discussed with a doctor.
settings.cycle.auto_period_fill_hint: When enabled, marking the first day auto-fills the next days based on your period length.
settings.change_password.title: Change password
settings.change_password.subtitle: Update your account password.
settings.recovery_code.title: Recovery code
settings.recovery_code.subtitle: Generate a new recovery code. Your previous code will stop working.
settings.recovery_code.generated_subtitl: Shown only once on this page. Save it offline now.
settings.export_invalid_date: Use a valid date in YYYY-MM-DD format.
settings.export_invalid_range: End date must be on or after start date.
settings.export_data_hint: Exports only manually tracked entries. Predictions (fertile window and ovulation) are not included.
settings.clear_data.title: Clear all tracking data
settings.clear_data.subtitle: Delete all tracked calendar entries and reset cycle settings to defaults. The symptom list stays.
settings.danger_zone.title: Danger zone
settings.danger_zone.subtitle: Delete your account permanently. This action cannot be undone.
settings.confirm_regenerate_recovery_cod: Regenerate your recovery code? The previous code will no longer work.
settings.confirm_clear_data: Clear tracked calendar entries and reset cycle settings? Your symptom list will stay.
settings.confirm_delete_account: Delete your account and all data permanently? This cannot be undone.
settings.error.invalid_input: Please provide current, new, and confirmation passwords.
settings.error.password_unchanged: New password must be different from current password.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Lume is built for private, self-hosted tracking.
privacy.zero_collection.title: Zero Data Collection
privacy.zero_collection.body: Lume runs on your own server. It does not include analytics, ad tracking, or hidden telemetry.
privacy.your_data.title: Your Data
privacy.your_data.body: Your records are stored locally in your SQLite database. You control access, backups, and deletion.
privacy.third_parties.title: Third Parties
privacy.third_parties.body: No third-party data sharing is built in.
privacy.open_source.title: Open Source
privacy.open_source.body: Lume is released under AGPL v3 and developed in the open on GitHub.
daylog.title: Daily log
calendar.title: Calendar
calendar.confirm_delete_day: Delete this day's entry? This cannot be undone.
calendar.error.period_flow_required: Please select flow when marking a period day.
calendar.select_day: Select a day in this month to edit.
stats.title: Statistics
stats.subtitle: Recent cycle trends and symptom frequency.
stats.data_notice: Track at least 3 full cycles to see a reliable trend.
stats.hidden_for_partner: Symptom data is hidden for partner accounts.
confirm.delete_entry: Are you sure you want to delete this entry?
common.error.too_many_requests: Too many requests. Please wait and try again.
warning.future_date: ‚ö†Ô∏è This is a future date. Data may be inaccurate.
rate_limit.title: Too Many Requests
